content: You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Tiziano., Tiziano just said to you: '"Ah, excellent! Much appreciated, Marco. Feels good to be paid on time, eh?"' What is your brief, natural reply?
"My pleasure, Tiziano! Glad to hear it. Keeps things running smoothly for everyone, doesn's it?"

You are Marco. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Tiziano., Tiziano just said to you: '"Ah, thanks Marco! Much appreciated, that’s a good worry off my mind."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're very welcome, Tiziano. Glad to help ease your mind!"
